name: Mei Garden Florals
projectDescription: Isabella and Lisa, passionate florists, partnered with me to transform their vision into a thriving online presence. Our mission was to develop a strong brand identity, launch an intuitive e-commerce platform, and implement a comprehensive digital marketing strategy. We successfully built a custom Shopify website, optimized for both search engines and conversion rates, and engaged potential customers through targeted Google and Meta ads. The project culminated in a notable blended ROAS of 2.7, marking a significant milestone in their business journey. Reflecting on this experience, I gained valuable insights into the intricacies of paid advertising, the importance of CRO, and the art of creating an informative and user-friendly website.

name: MiCoordinates
projectTitle: Gems Online: Nick & Partner's Journey into Digital Jewellery
projectDescription: Nick and his wife, seasoned veterans with 20 years in the jewelry industry, embarked on a digital expansion to showcase and sell their exquisite creations online. Our collaboration aimed at establishing a strong brand identity, developing an engaging e-commerce platform, and carefully curating their product lineup. Together, we strategized an entry-level product offering as a foundation for future upscale collections, including solid gold items and engagement rings. The project culminated in the launch of a bespoke Shopify store, complete with compelling copywriting, conversion rate optimization, and SEO enhancements. This venture offered a valuable opportunity to leverage my e-commerce expertise, deepening my skills in CRO and SEO in a new and dynamic context.

name: Pho Don Restaurant
techStack: React JS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Sanity.io (Headless CMS)
projectTitle: Pho Don's Digital Revival: A Modern Twist on Vietnamese Dining
projectDescription: Don, chef and owner of Pho Don, a beloved Vietnamese eatery nestled in the bustling Hastings and Renfrew area, sought to modernize the restaurant's online footprint after a decade. As the dining landscape evolved towards digital interfaces, the need for a refreshed website and an enhanced online ordering experience became paramount. Our collaborative effort focused on revamping the website to be SEO-friendly and user-centric. We streamlined the menu, categorizing offerings into six main sections for ease of navigation, and enriched the homepage with compelling narratives about Pho Don's unique culinary journey. This project was a rewarding opportunity to delve into the challenges faced by established businesses seeking digital rejuvenation and to craft tailored solutions that resonate with their identity and customer needs.

name: Nina Mak Realty
projectTitle: Nina's Real Estate Realm: Building a Personal Brand Online
projectDescription: Nina sought to establish her digital identity to present her portfolio and services to prospective clients. The project's cornerstone was the creation of a custom website, tailored to encapsulate Nina's personal brand, her array of services, showcased properties, and insightful market analyses. Drawing inspiration from leading industry websites, we meticulously crafted a platform that not only highlights Nina's professional expertise but also provides valuable information for her audience. This endeavor offered me a unique lens into the real estate domain, enriching my understanding of the intricacies involved in developing a specialized website from the ground up, optimizing for local SEO, and the importance of authentic content in establishing a personal brand online.
